OOC: Well, Dewey, you certainly are offending me, as god is and has been my=
 enemy for years. I'm not sorry to say that I hate the idea of god and the =
bible, either. You've been asked to stop replying with your religion and al=
l. I stopped replying to your mails and just let them slide by, and you con=
tinue, on and on. So my reply to this one is here to ask you to stop. Perha=
ps you'll understand that I don't like this sort of thing thrust into my fa=
ce. Please forgive this e-mail, rAuq...

  F=
rom: Kyle Stewart
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Monday, September 09=
, 2002 12:26 PM

  OOC: Sorry, but =
the modern day image of Christian is

oes and offend

  someone=

 I wasn't going to shy away

  --- warrior=
azure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:

do this, but here it

  > Sarah, it's a good thing you apolog=
ized, but please,

ere. They don't

al? The only thing
  > anyone around here

sts you send.
  > Also, you should know that Rauq, Rudra and I are the
  > =
three council

  > p=
eople (even if 
  > some think otherwise). When there is a problem case,
  =
> we get forced to 
  > moderate someone, and this means no posting for som=
e
  > time.
  > Rauq did send you a link to yahoogroups, but please
  > als=
o check 
  > www.nbwrpg.com to check out the rules. If anything
  > else, i=
t'll help 
  > you to role-play even better.
  > 
  > For everyone, please =
remember that this is a
  > transformer rpg, not a 
  > religious forum. I =
believe in my own way, but I
  > respect what others 
  > believe. The poin=
t is that not everyone would like
  > to hear about it.
  > And please, if =
you have to tell something to

n if it takes longer.
  > 
  > Thanks.
